Name: Straya
About the game: Straya is an Action based First Person Shooter set in Australia around the late 1960's. With a focus on surviving the many dangerous animals that inhabit the land, air and water, the player can perform jobs, hunt, collect and roam freely in an open world. Travel by foot, horse, chopper and boats. Collect bush tucker to craft elixers. Use the metal detector to find valuables and avoid land mines. Pan for gold and fish in the creeks and rivers. Get access to special items by performing jobs and discovering locations. Experience elements based on the Dreamtime stories.
